mapper.sql: id, name, gender, tel, email, birth_date, points, account, password
mapper.insert:
insert into customer
id,
name,
gender,
tel,
email,
birth_date,
points,
account,
password,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{birthDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{points,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update customer
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birth_date = #{birthDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
points = #{points,jdbcType=INTEGER},
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM customer where name=${0} OR account=${0} and password=${1}
mapper.update: update customer set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth_date = #{birthDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, points = #{points,jdbcType=INTEGER}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
